body:
Comment 4 by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
The truth is that it is very difficult to notice the difference

// log.Exit("capite?")
* * *
2010/12/31 08:44:49 capite?
* * *

// Method of logger
// l := log.New(os.Stderr, "gofoo: ", 0)
// l.Printf("capite?")
* * *
gofoo: capite?


* * *
Note that using log.Exit, you always get the date format while that it could be changed
at using a method of log
